law.catch_line: After providing for due or accrued expenses, losses, interest, and taxes, the board of directors of ...
law.text:
After providing for due or accrued expenses, losses, interest, and taxes, the board of directors of a subsidiary savings bank may declare a cash dividend only from the following:
Its undivided profits; or
With the approval of the Commissioner, its surplus in excess of 100 percent of its required capital stock.
